mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, description, type, discount_amount, discount_rate, min_amount, max_discount_amount, total_count, received_count, used_count, limit_per_user, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, status, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by FROM mall_coupon
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, COALESCE(uc.received_count, 0) as user_received_count FROM mall_coupon c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT coupon_id, COUNT(*) as received_count FROM mall_user_coupon WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY coupon_id ) uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id WHERE c.status = 1 AND c.valid_start_time <= NOW() AND c.valid_end_time >= NOW() AND c.received_count < c.total_count AND (c.limit_per_user = 0 OR COALESCE(uc.received_count, 0) < c.limit_per_user) AND c.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.* FROM mall_coupon c INNER JOIN mall_user_coupon uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} AND uc.status = 0 AND c.status = 1 AND c.valid_start_time <= NOW() AND c.valid_end_time >= NOW() AND c.min_amount <= #{orderAmount} AND c.del_flag = '0' AND uc.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.type = 1 THEN c.discount_amount WHEN c.type = 2 THEN LEAST(#{orderAmount} * c.discount_rate / 100, c.max_discount_amount) ELSE 0 END DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_count, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inactive_count, SUM(CASE WHEN valid_end_time < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as expired_count, SUM(total_count) as total_issued, SUM(received_count) as total_received, SUM(used_count) as total_used, ROUND(SUM(used_count) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(received_count), 0), 2) as usage_rate FROM mall_coupon WHERE del_flag = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE mall_coupon SET received_count = received_count + #{quantity}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{couponId} AND received_count + #{quantity} <= total_count AND del_flag = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM mall_coupon WHERE valid_end_time < NOW() AND status = 1 AND del_flag = '0'
